name: Upper Sans Souci: Stones that Breathe
description: Granite throat wind alive. Five petroglyph carvings. Six bat clusters roosting. One abandoned stick leaning. Naia rubs symbols; Maliya feels stone; Kassim listens. Riddle: Not every guide is a friend; take away the liar to find the sum.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Granite throat wind alive. Five petroglyph carvings. Six bat clusters roosting. One abandoned stick leaning. Naia rubs symbols; Maliya feels stone; Kassim listens.. Key props numeric: 5 carvings, 6 batClusters, 1 stick. Cipher letter: K Bearing: 100°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
